def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, in get1idxs(idxs):
        check_x_small = is_small(x, ctx)
        check_x_light = is_light(x, ctx)
        check_x_alone = all([not all_close([x, dot], ctx) for dot in idxs if dot != x])
        if (
            check_x_small
            and check_x_light
            and check_x_alone
        ):
            results.append([x])
    return results
state = turn(state)
